summary: Dr. Philip W. Halstead, M.D. had his medical license suspended for failing to comply with prior probationary conditions, including not meeting face-to-face with his supervising physician and not ensuring quarterly reports were submitted. This action followed a history of standard of care violations and persistent practice deficiencies related to physical examinations and differential diagnoses. He is required to undergo a comprehensive competence assessment by CPEP and complete any recommended educational interventions.
